soccer.common

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.MovingObj
      • soccer.common.Player

  • public class Player
extends MovingObj
    This class (together with super class) represents player state vector; these data are transmitted from the server to clients and back. Also could be used for building the world model in clients.
    Author:
    Yu Zhang Modifications by Vadim Kyrylov (2004-2011)

      • Player

        public Player()

      • Player

        public Player(char side,
      int id,
      Vector2d position,
      double dir)
        Construct a player.
        Parameters:
        side - the player's side.
        id - the player's number.
        position - the location of the player.
        dir - the facing direction of the player.
